name: @vendia/codegen-vendia-client-plugin
author: Matt Silverstein
@comment: keep auto-bind in devDependencies to fix ESM import issue - tsup will pull it into bundle directly if its in devDeps rather than deps

scripts.@comment: Run 'pnpm dev' and review sdk output at codegen-tools/test/temp/generated.ts

readme:
# Development
Run `pnpm dev` while making changes and review the output at `codegen-tools/test/temp/generated.ts`. Can also run `pnpm test:int` from the codegen-tools package directory to run integration tests against current sdk output.
